title.romaji: Masuda Kousuke Gekijou Gag Manga Biyori
title.native: 増田こうすけ劇場 ギャグマンガ日和

description:
Gag Manga Biyori is an anime that is about absolutely nothing. It is comprised of 12 short stories (5 minutes long each) that only build up a small amount of plot for each story. The anime feeds off the stupidest things, but is quite humorous.

(Source: Anime News Network)
